column5: I was at the Senior Center today and failed a Health and Safety course that was put on for us old fogies ...  One of the questions was: "In the event of a fire, what steps would you take?"  "Really big ones" was apparently the wrong answer.....
LMAO   It Happens --Don't beat yourself over it  P-l-e-a-s-e !   Am sure you can do a re-write ?      Thanks for the Chuckle   Stay Well   TightLines   Paul
Of course that's wrong. We're talking seniors here. Many short ones hopefully at a somewhat reasonable pace would be the right answer. That's what I'm practicing for.
Well at least you made it home.  Did you see Solo there?
Fastest possible steps?  Take steps to main floor exit?  Turn off Oxygen?
You're both wrong!!!! The correct answer is none!!! I will run my scooter on high!!!!  :tease:
I guess I could have also said " Push faster you young whippersnapper, I'm not paying these outrageous prices for less than quick service".
Nothin wrong with that answer where I come from!
